resources.string: It is one of the oldest mosques in Hyderabad, Telangana in India. It is one of the largest masajids in India.
It was constructed in 1591, is a monument and mosque located in Hyderabad, Telangana, India.
It is a fort in Southern India and was the capital of the medieval sultanate of the Qutb Shahi dynasty.
It is a palace of the Nizams of Hyderabad state.
It is a Hindu temple, built on a 280 feet high hillock called Naubath Pahad on a 13 acres plot
It was established with the objective of conserving and breeding of endangered species
It is a small public, urban park of 36 acres adjacent to Hussain Sagar lake in Hyderabad, India.
It is the world\'s tallest monolith of Gautama Buddha.
South Indian and Mughlai dishes combine with those from China and Thailand at this chic venue.
Designed to take the diner back to 1853, this train-themed restaurant serves north Indian cuisine.
Chutney is a sauce in the cuisines of the Indian subcontinent.
It is dining room for Hyderabadi cuisine, family meals and curries.
Set within gardens, this posh hotel is 1.7 km from Khairatabad Railway Station.
